text: CAIRO, Jan 12 Egypt is reopening its airspace to Qatari flights and allowing the resumption of flights between the two countries, aviation sources and state media said on Tuesday.The decision follows moves by Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates and Egypt to end a boycott in which they severed diplomatic, trade and travel ties with Qatar in 2017. (Reporting by Abdelnasser Aboelfadl and Mahmoud Mourad Writing by Aidan Lewis)
